description: FrankenPHP/Caddy monitoring optimized for Symfony applications. Focus on worker health, restarts, and performance.

panels.description: Rate of worker restarts per second - HIGH VALUES = crashes/memory issues
panels.title: ðŸš¨ Worker Restart Rate

panels.description: Resident memory - watch for growth indicating leaks
panels.title: Process Memory

panels.description: Percentage of PHP threads busy processing requests
panels.title: Thread Utilization %

panels.description: Requests waiting for available worker
panels.title: Request Queue Depth

panels.description: Request rate across all workers
panels.title: Requests per Second

panels.description: Workers currently processing requests
panels.title: Busy PHP Workers

panels.description: Mean response time for all requests
panels.title: Average Response Time

panels.description: Cumulative worker restarts since start
panels.title: Total Worker Restarts

panels.description: Median response time
panels.title: P50 Response Time

panels.description: 95th percentile response time
panels.title: P95 Response Time

panels.description: Percentage of 4xx client errors
panels.title: 4xx Response %

panels.description: Percentage of 5xx server errors
panels.title: 5xx Response %

panels.description: Worker restart rate over time - investigate spikes
panels.title: Worker Restart Rate Over Time

panels.description: Process memory usage - look for continuous growth
panels.title: Memory Usage Trend

panels.description: Average response time showing system speed
panels.title: Response Time

panels.description: PHP thread utilization over time
panels.title: PHP Thread Utilization

panels.description: OPcache hit ratio percentage. Values above 95% indicate good cache performance. Low hit rates suggest frequent code changes or insufficient cache size.
panels.title: OPcache Hit Ratio

panels.description: Memory utilization percentage of OPcache. High usage (>85%) may indicate need for more memory allocation or cache optimization.
panels.title: OPcache Memory Usage

panels.description: Number of cached scripts vs maximum capacity. Shows how close you are to the script limit.
panels.title: Script Cache Usage

panels.description: OPcache status indicators. Shows if cache is enabled, full, or if restarts are pending.
panels.title: OPcache Status

panels.description: Rate of cache hits and misses over time. Consistent high hit rates indicate good cache performance.
panels.title: Cache Hit/Miss Rate

panels.description: Memory usage breakdown showing used, free, and wasted memory in the OPcache.
panels.title: Memory Usage Breakdown

panels.description: Interned strings memory usage and count. Shows efficiency of string deduplication in PHP.
panels.title: Interned Strings

panels.description: JIT compilation status and buffer usage. Shows if JIT is enabled and how much buffer is being used.
panels.title: JIT Status

panels.description: OPcache restart counters showing different types of cache restarts over time.
panels.title: Cache Restarts

panels.description: Number of busy PHP threads currently processing requests
panels.title: Busy PHP Threads

panels.description: Total number of PHP threads available
panels.title: Total PHP Threads

panels.description: Running workers that have successfully called frankenphp_handle_request at least once
panels.title: Ready PHP Workers

panels.description: Total requests processed by PHP workers
panels.title: Worker Requests Total

panels.description: Average request processing time per worker
panels.title: Avg Worker Request Time

panels.description: The number of requests currently being handled
panels.title: Requests in Flight

panels.description: PHP worker utilization and queue depth over time
panels.title: PHP Worker Status & Queue

panels.description: Worker request rate over time
panels.title: Worker Request Rate

title: FrankenPHP + Caddy (Symfony Optimized)
